channel.title: POlease Help with ip jail
channel.description:
Ok So for my server ive got ip mute and ive got ip ban but im trying to make an ip jail ive got the jail code but i cant figure out how to add the ip part? anyhelp?? Pleae gove me the code if you can... Thanks for any help
Thanks, Buddy

item.title: POlease Help with ip jail
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

This is something that you cant logout if you jailed

case 9154: //Log out { if ((absX >= 3009 && absX <= 3198 && absY >=3023 && absY <=3203 )) { sendMessage("You can't log out in jail!"); } else {

item.title: POlease Help with ip jail
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Lol, IP jail?
Add their IP to a list and check the list when a player logs in. If their IP is contained in the list, teleport them to the jail.

Read full topic
